abook_corporate_address_format: The email address format is incorrect
abook_corporate_address_missing: Missing email address, please enter a valid email address
abook_corporate_listofwriteuser: List of users allowed to write
abook_corporate_step_1: All the users who have the write access on the corporate abook are listed below
abook_corporate_step_2: You can Disable or Enable a user's write access
abook_corporate_step_3: You can also add new user with the write access
abook_import_need_to_be_resolved: Some contact's field need to be resolved.
abook_items_will_be_definitively_deleted: The selected contacts/groups will be permanently deleted !
abook_no_rights_to_delete: You do not have rights to delete a contact/group
abook_no_rights_to_edit: You do not have rights to edit contact/group
abook_no_rights_to_import: You do not have rights to import contacts
abook_no_rights_to_view: You do not have rights to view details of contact/group
abook_not_rights_to_add: Attention: you do not have permission to add a new contact/group
abook_select_item_is_group: The selected item is a group of contacts
abook_select_one_contact: Please select one contact/group to edit
add_from_msg_contact_added: Your contact has been added to the address book
add_from_msg_fill_alias: You must fill in the Alias field !
add_from_msg_fill_firstname: You must fill in the Firstname field !
click_to_mark_as_favorite: Click to mark contact as Favorite
click_to_unmark_as_favorite: Click to unmark contact as Favorite
conflict_contact_duplicated: The contact already exists. It will be duplicated.
conflict_contact_ingroup: This contact is member of a group. You cannot move it, only copy it.
contact_added_to_abook: Your contact has been added to the address book
contact_communication_text: Emails, phones, IM, social networks, websites
contact_export_download_info: Click on Download and select a file destination in the pop-up window:
contact_export_download_info_vcard: Click on a contact to download it and select a file destination in the pop-up window:
contact_fill_alias: You must fill in the Alias field !
contact_search_received_title: Search messages received from this email address
contact_search_sent_title: Search messages sent to this email address
display_mask_choose_fields: You have to choose some fields.
display_mask_filtering_explanation: (the alphabetical filtering will be done on this field)
display_mask_help_1: The display mask option allows you to define which fields (columns) will appear in your contact list.
display_mask_help_2: Attention! The order of the fields in the Selected Fields list will be used for the columns in the Contacts section.
display_mask_saved: The display mask has been saved.
display_mask_sorting_explanation: (default sorting will be applied on this field)
edit_contact_confirm_remove_photo: Are you sure you want to remove the photo ?
edit_contact_fill_alias_field: Please fill in the alias field!
edit_contact_removed: The selected contacts have been deleted.
edit_contact_save_contact: Do not forget to save your contact!
edit_contact_valid_email: You must enter a valid email address!
edit_contact_verify_business_country: The business address's country should be verified before saving the contact again.
edit_contact_verify_private_country: The personal address's country should be verified before saving the contact again.
import_contacts_consider_as_contact: Consider this item as a contact
import_contacts_csv_browse_menu: In Outlook, open your address book and then select in the menu bar: File > Import / Export > Export to a File
import_contacts_csv_browse_to_file: Browse to your previously saved CSV file, select it and click "Open".
import_contacts_csv_browse_to_import: Browse to your previously saved CSV file, select it and click "Import".
import_contacts_csv_charset: Select the charset of CSV file
import_contacts_csv_from_outlook: Import an address book from Outlook (CSV format)
import_contacts_csv_save_file: Save the file (CSV format) on your hard disk
import_contacts_csv_select_format: In the box, select "Export comma separated value"
import_contacts_csv_upload_file: Click on "Import Address Book" button on the top of this page.
import_contacts_import_csv: Import an address book from Outlook (CSV format)
import_contacts_import_ldif: Import an address book from Mozilla Thunderbird (LDIF format)
import_contacts_ldif_browse_menu: In Thunderbird, open your address book and then select in the menu bar: Tools > Export
import_contacts_ldif_browse_to_file: Browse to your previously saved LDIF file, select it and click "Open".
import_contacts_ldif_browse_to_import: Browse to your previously saved LDIF file, select it and click "Import".
import_contacts_ldif_charset: Select the charset of LDIF file
import_contacts_ldif_from_thunderbird: Import an address book from Mozilla Thunderbird (LDIF format)
import_contacts_ldif_save_file: Save the file (LDIF format) on your hard disk
import_contacts_ldif_upload_file: Click on "Import Address Book" button on the top of this page.
import_contacts_select_format_to_import: Select the format of the address book/contact to import
import_contacts_vcard_browse_menu: Select "Address Book --> Export --> Visit Card" in menu File
import_contacts_vcard_browse_to_file: Select the file you have just saved
import_contacts_vcard_save_file: Save your Visit Card file on your hard disk
import_contacts_vcard_upload_file: Click on the "Import address book" button
import_contacts_vcard_upload_import: Click on the "Browse" button, select the file you have just saved and click "Import"
mini_abook_contact_added_success: Your contacts have been added successfully
mini_abook_info_1: The contacts below are already in the target address book
mini_abook_info_2: You can choose what you want to do for each
resolve_conflict_no_email_no_send: Contacts without Email address will not receive your message.
sharing_edit_help_contacts: The sharing feature allows you to share your address book with other people.
sharing_edit_help_contacts_dot_0: Enter the email address of the person you wish to share the address book with.
sharing_edit_help_contacts_dot_2: Each user that you indicate will automatically be given access permission to read the address book.
sharing_edit_help_contacts_dot_3: You can give further permissions by selecting specific options:
sharing_edit_help_contacts_dot_3_1: Change: allows you to change existing contacts
userabook_delete_confirm: The address book will be permanently deleted !
userabook_delete_shared_confirm: The shared address book will be permanently deleted !
userabook_display_change: The visibility of the address book was changed
userabook_modified: The address book was successfully updated
userabook_set_missing: Your must fill the name and the nickname
userabook_set_name_error: Your must fill the name and the nickname
view_contact_member_of_groups: This contact is a member of the following groups
